Amazing hotpot experience! The broths were flavorful and well-balanced, the meat and vegetables were fresh and sliced perfectly, and the dipping sauce bar had plenty of options. Staff were attentive and refilled our pot quickly. Cozy atmosphere and fair prices â€” a great spot for groups or family dinners. Will definitely be back.
Good all you can eat hotpot place! Good quality fruits and desserts as well.

My family and I visited other Hot Pot locations in New Jersey. However, this is the first Hot Pot weâ€™ve visited in New York. This was a very pleasant experience and while expensive, it was more than worth it. Highly recommend visiting!
Everytime I join in waiting list on line when I leave my house. My house in flushing, but my wife really love this place, we almost be there once a week, so we know when we can get in line.
The hot pot very delicious and the food so fresh. Services are really good and friendly. Highly recommend!!

So great!! Clean, and the waiters are so nice. Everything is AYCE : including drinks, deserts, meat, sashimi , and more. Individual booths as well.
Very clean and good location. Great seafood options, will definitely be back again soon!
Every good restaurant. Always enjoy having dinner tyhere

Chong Qing Wharf Hot Pot was an excellent experience! The food was flavorful, fresh, and perfectly cooked(by myself lol). The broth had a great balance of spice and richness, we tried the spicy and the chicken fish as and all the ingredients tasted high quality. The staff was friendly, and the atmosphere was warm and inviting, definitely a spot worth coming back to for authentic hot pot.

This hotpot restaurant is a hidden gem. The broths are rich and flavorful, the ingredients fresh and beautifully presented, and the atmosphere warm and welcoming. Every bite feels like comfort in a bowl. The staff are kind and attentive, making the whole experience feel like dining with family. A perfect spot to slow down, share a meal, and savor the moment. Canâ€™t wait to come back!

Chong Qing Wharf Hot Pot is an AYCE hot pot restaurant that offers fresh foods from meats to sashimi to seafood to veggies, a great variety of unlimited drinks and most of all, excellent service!

We simply joined their waitlist on Google Maps and waited for their phone call that our table was ready. We haven't come for a long time but upon arriving, Tammy greeted us and immediately remembered us! And most special of all, she remembered our Baby! â¤ï¸ Shows how much they value their customers ğŸ˜Š

We enjoyed all the different food options including fruits, meats, sashimi, seafood, veggies and desserts. They give you an option after you're seated between lobster, geoduck or a sashimi platter. Their price is more expensive compared to other AYCE hot pot places but we appreciate the freshness of their foods and the many options we can choose from.

Everyone that works here are really friendly and works very efficiently. Every time we asked for something, we got it pretty fast. Ricky was one of the few people who took care of our table and they were great! We appreciate them making sure everything was good especially with our Baby throughout our dinner. As parents, we're super happy when any place shows extra care to our Baby. We had a great experience dining here and would definitely recommend this! ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ğŸ‘ğŸ¼

Chong Qing Wharf Hot Pot is an excellent spot for anyone who enjoys all-you-can-eat dining. The food was fresh and very flavorful, making it a great place to share a meal with friends or family. The seafood selection was especially impressive, with plenty of options to enjoy either cooked in the hot pot or eaten raw. The salmon, in particular, stood outâ€”it was better than what Iâ€™ve had at most other places. Overall, Iâ€™d highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a fun and delicious dining experience.

The food here is fresh and delicious. The staffs are very good. Everything is perfect. If I have a chance, I will definitely come back to use the service here again.

Seafood was incredibly fresh, and the place was spotless and well organized. The staff were attentive and caring, and the variety of dishes was impressive. Highly recommend this spot for anyone craving authentic hot pot!

Located in Brooklyn, this AYCE and AYCD spot is a hotpot lover's dream. This spacious restaurant has lots of tables and booths for parties of different sizes to enjoy hot pot together. You should also try to get your name on the reservation list ahead of getting here (you can do it online!) as it tends to have a wait.

Here, you can get not only hot pot, but also skewers and sashimi. So you can bet that we also ordered skewers and sashimi. The skewers were juicy and huge portions, and the sashimi had a large variety and was pretty fresh. All of the ingredients for the hot pot were great quality and it was so good. There's so many options and premium seafood options as well. Love the desserts and appetizers that you can get too! Would highly recommend to anyone who loves hot pot.

Great quality seafood and meats for AYCE!!! Friendly service and lots of drink options. They have a lot more variety than any other AYCE I've ever had. They even serve durian which is usually very pricey. 10/10, we will definitely come back again!! There is a 2 hour limit but they're not strict if it's not super busy.
Spicy hotpot is so good, very similar to local Chongqing style. Love it. The base is absolutely delicious, best in US. Really brings the whole meal together.

Awesome food, attentive staff
It might seem pricy, but its worth it.  Large selection of meats/seafood/sashimi/veggies.
Pay cash get extra goodies.

Really great customer service and a variety of meats and seafood. They were able to sit a party of 13 on a busy night which we so appreciated since we had a baby with us. I thoroughly enjoyed the unlimited durian :)

Also donâ€™t sleep on this dessert, so good!

I had an amazing dining experience at this seafood hotpot buffet in Brooklyn! The ingredients were super fresh, especially the seafood â€” the crab, shrimp, and clams were top quality. The variety of sauces and broths made it easy to customize the flavors just the way I like. The staff was friendly and attentive, and the place was clean and well-organized. Great value for the price, too. Highly recommend it if you're a hotpot or seafood lover!

Very fresh seafood and great service. I believe itâ€™s the best seafood hotpot I had in NYC. If you are a super seafood fan, you canâ€™t miss it. Found out the secret server in the restaurant, you will have special deshell service! Just remember to add waitlist to avoid the wait time!

This is our go-to spot! The seafood is always fresh, and we love that they offer free lobster and geoduck, itâ€™s such a treat. The service is excellent, and Olay in particular is amazing: attentive, welcoming, and always going above and beyond to make sure we have a great experience. We truly enjoy coming here every time!

We were in western Brooklyn to do some auto sport modifications and needed to pick up our car at 5pm, no chance of getting back into Long Island on the Belt Parkway at the Pinnacle of NYC's rush hour so we decided to wait it out and eat locally at a premium AYCE hot-poteria. The selections were very good and included one premium choice of lobster or geoduck. We had the geoduck sashimi, tiny, but fresh. The selections weren't exorbitant, but covered, seafood, meats, vegetables, boba tea (free, if you pay cash) and canned premium soft drinks. Our server was "Ada", ABC, BBC, extremely proficient, professional and courteous. She was the star of our evening here. The table wasn't ideal as we couldn't score a booth and the vents at our aisle table were pulling the steam directly into our faces. Still the food and drinks were good enough to overcome the constant steam blasts. $160 for 2 of us, all-in, cash. Yummy in Brooklyn.
Food is fresh and clean! Durian is my favorite and unlimited. Sashimi unlimited is great! Eating with my friends, the service is attentive and the atmosphere is welcoming! Will come back!

Loved this spot! Variety of options when it comes to seafood, meats, appetizers, and everything else. Everything was of good quality and fresh!! Had a great experience here and it is definitely worth a visit, even the deserts are a must try.

super delicious and our server ADA was amazing!! everything tasted fresh and high quality. their dragonfruit coconut dessert was really good and their drinks too. this is now my new go to hotpot spot.

The food was delicious, and the service was excellent. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, patiently providing us with information about the menu. Shout out to â€œEllieâ€ she was very helpful and friendly. Weâ€™ll definitely come back

If youâ€™re in Brooklyn and craving an all-you-can-eat premium hotpot experience, look no further than Chong Qing Wharf! ğŸ¥¢ğŸ²
For just $63.95 per person, you get everythingâ€”rich soup broths, the freshest seafood ğŸ¦, high-quality meats, appetizers, sashimi, vegetables, desserts, and even free fruit tea! ğŸ§‹ Oh, and did we mention the unlimited durian? ğŸ˜
From melt-in-your-mouth sashimi to live shrimp cooked fresh at your table, the variety here is endless. Plus, the service? Absolutely top-notch! ğŸ™Œ
Tag your hotpot crew and make your reservations nowâ€”you donâ€™t want to miss this feast! ğŸ¢ğŸ”¥

The experience was nothing short of extraordinary. The warm ambiance, thoughtfully decorated interiors, and inviting atmosphere set the stage for an unforgettable meal. Every dish on the menu was a testament to culinary excellence, prepared with fresh, high-quality ingredients and bursting with flavor.

What truly made the evening exceptional was the service. My server, Selina, went above and beyond to ensure my dining experience was seamless. From offering insightful recommendations to patiently explaining each dish, friendly and attentive manner made us feel genuinely welcomed and cared for. Her impeccable timing and dedication to guest satisfaction elevated the entire evening, turning a simple dinner into a memorable celebration.

I highly recommend Chong Qing Wharf Hot Pot for anyone looking to enjoy. Iâ€™m already looking forward to my next visit!

my must go place when i am in townï¼ i brought my friend here today, we came all the way from Boston and she loves it. This is my 4th visits and good as usual. I will recommend to everyone who loves hotpot and seafood.super friendly staff! Btw they have durian AYCE!! My favorite!!

First time eating here since my little one was born. The food is as high quality as before. And itâ€™s definitely worth the price. I would come back again, for sure.

âœ¨ All-You-Can-Eat HOTPOT Heaven ğŸ¤¯

Unlimited meat, seafood, sashimi, drinks, dessertsâ€¦ yes, everything is included ğŸ‘ğŸ”¥ From raw to bubbling to perfectly cooked â€” every bite was a win ğŸ¥©ğŸ¦ğŸ²

This spot brings the feast with fresh ingredients galore: seafood, sashimi, BBQ, hot foods, boba, fruits, and desserts (they even have durian â€” my fave! ğŸ˜).

ğŸ“Œ $63.95 per person | â° 2-hour limit | ğŸ‘¥ Min. 2 people

Pro tip: Go for the lobster or geoduck from the premium selection â€” best bang for your buck! ğŸ’¥ğŸ¦

If you love AYCE and variety, this oneâ€™s a must-try!ğŸŒŸ

What an absolutely amazing hot pot. Here is the nitty gritty.
1. Yes itâ€™s expensive. At $62.99 itâ€™s pricey
2. Yes itâ€™s worth it if you eat a decent amount of the super fresh sashimi and order lots of crab legs, fresh beef which is some of the best quality Iâ€™ve had and drink the really rich soup broth
3. Yes there is a very long wait as theyâ€™ve gained some popularity. but itâ€™s worth the wait
4. Yes you can order fresh (frozen) durian as much as you want

The food was the star of the show. Lobster is one of the main specialties. You can order it once but you have a choice of
1. Sashimi or sushi platter (skip this you can order that with your regular buffet as part of the ayce)
2. Geoduck which honestly I donâ€™t find to be all that amazing but hey. Who am I to judge.
3. A few other specialty dishes but I canâ€™t recall them.
4. We went with the whole live lobsters.

Food was insanely fresh. The beef is some of the best hotpot beef Iâ€™ve had. The broths were amazing. All meats and seafoods were of exceptional quality.

All in all if youâ€™re looking to splurge at a hotpot this is the place.

Bustling atmosphere accompanied by a splendid variety of seafood and other hotpot delicacies. Waiters were very attentive, ensuring that you get your food on time within the 2 hours limit. Do wish there were performances, which would better spice up the dining experience.

Chong Qing Wharf in Brooklyn offers an immersive AYCEhot pot experience . This hotpot restaurant delivers both quantity and quality, making it a favorite among hot pot enthusiasts.

The wide selection includes various meats, vegetables, tofu, and even durian for the adventurous palate. My favorite aspect of this restaurant  is the complimentary sashimi platter or lobster offered with each hot pot order.

Chong Qing Wharf delivers a memorable hot pot dining experience characterized by a wide variety of fresh ingredients, flavorful broths, and attentive service. It's a must visit for hot pot aficionados in Brooklyn.

Check out my instagram @michellesinghh for more food reviews.

An unforgettable feast that left all four of us in a collective FOOD COMA in the best possible way. We came hungry, but clearly underestimated the sheer abundance this place offers. Between the hot pot, BBQ skewers, fried treats, desserts, and drinks, we didnâ€™t just eatâ€”we committed. By the end, we were full to the point of existential reflection.
What truly made the experience stand out, beyond the wide array of delicious options, was the incredible staff. Warm, welcoming, and genuinely fun to talk to. We even asked whether theyâ€™d ever seen someone eat an excessive amount of durian ï¼ˆso curious), and they replied with stories of guests who come just for that. LegendsğŸ‘
If this restaurant werenâ€™t so far from home, Iâ€™d probably be here every weekâ€”though my waistline might disagree. Highly recommended for anyone looking to indulge without limits, laugh with friends, and temporarily lose track of how full a human can be.

We had an amazing time at [Hot Pot Restaurant Name]! From the moment we walked in, the staff was warm and welcoming, and the atmosphere was cozy yet lively â€” perfect for a meal with friends or family.

The broth options were rich and flavorful (we especially loved the spicy Sichuan and mushroom broths), and the selection of meats, seafood, and fresh vegetables was incredibly fresh and well-stocked. The dipping sauces were customizable and made everything taste even better â€” thereâ€™s something for everyone, whether you like it garlicky, spicy, or savory.

Everything was well-organized, clean, and the service was attentive without being intrusive. We never had to wait long for refills or help.

If you love interactive dining and bold flavors, this place is a must-visit. Weâ€™ll definitely be back â€” next time with even more friends!
